Platform forNepali Aspirants.

We are tech company helping and inspirng youths/aspirants to get successfully pass entrance exam of +2 entrance, bachelor entrance (such as CEE, Engineering), Loksewa, License entrance with languages entrance preparation coming in near future.

What You Can Expect Here?

Aspirants Nepal is Nepal's growing education enterprise which inspires students for different field of entrance preparation by means of exams and learning mechanism.

Hey, Aspirants!

One of the best outcomes expected for choosing an Aspirants Nepal is networking and establishing connections with fellow peers.

We will prepare all aspirants of our family through 1000+ questions and hundreads of set models with weekly live test and motivating those student by rewarding the topper one. Follow our facebook and instagram page for exciting rewards offer and many more.

Prepare Yourself As A Aspirant

Practise Thousands Questions

Practise from thousands of available questions which aim to make you perfect for any type of questions asked in respective entrance exams.

Prepare Yourself With MCQ

Hundreds of set models and weekly live exams with latest curriculum pattern will prepare you enoughly for any kind of MCQ's to face with.

Frequently Raised Questions

If you have any queries kindly contact with us with given details.

Our aim is to produce competitive candidate for any entrance preparation.We will provide with thousands of questions for all categories: +2 entrance, bachelor entrance, loksewa and license for now.Weekly live test will be plus point for student enrolled here. We will be providing essentials information, notices, routines and all resources so that student should not spend time searching these stuffs online.

Weekly live test with rewarding options and thousands of available questions will be our special offer given to our users. And 4 categories of loksewa, license, +2 entrance and bachelor entrance in same platform has made us unique.

No fee. It's free.
